unnormalised: **EdTech Startup 'Shiksha Saathi' Revolutionizes Learning with Adaptive Tech!**
normalised: **EdTech Startup 'Shiksha Saathi' Revolutionizes Learning with Adaptive Tech!**

unnormalised: Bangalore-based EdTech startup, Shiksha Saathi, is making waves with its adaptive learning platform! Remember those endless hours spent poring over textbooks? Well, now kids in places like Kanpur and Chennai can learn at their own pace.
normalised: Bangalore-based EdTech startup, Shiksha Saathi, is making waves with its adaptive learning platform! Remember those endless hours spent poring over textbooks? Well, now kids in places like Kanpur and Chennai can learn at their own pace.

unnormalised: Their platform, built by Dr. Sharma and his team at IIT Delhi, uses AI to understand a student’s strengths and weaknesses. It then tailors the learning experience, focusing on areas where they need the most help. Think personalized lessons, practice questions, and even the occasional fun game based on Bollywood themes to keep things engaging!

unnormalised: Initial trials in a Zilla Parishad school showed impressive results. Students showed an average improvement of 20% in their exam scores. The company just secured Rs. 5 Crore in seed funding and plans to expand its reach, targeting schools across UP and Bihar. Their new office space in Mumbai spans 2000 sq ft and houses a team of dedicated developers and educators. Sounds promising, right? Expect more announcements soon!
